sourcesContent:
<template>
  
  <n-config-provider :theme="dark ? darkTheme : null" :theme-overrides="myTheme">
    <n-message-provider>
      <router-view></router-view>
    </n-message-provider>
    <n-global-style />
  </n-config-provider>
</template>

<script setup>
import {ref, provide} from 'vue'

import {
  NConfigProvider,
  NMessageProvider,
  darkTheme,
  NButton,
  NGlobalStyle,
} from 'naive-ui'

import myTheme from './theme.js'

const dark = ref(false)
// 向后代组件传递数据
provide('dark', dark)

</script>
<script>
export default {
  name: 'App'
}
</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
